name: Perils of Baking
description:
Perils of Baking is a 2D platformer akin to the retro games that inspired it. You play as the younger of two brothers, famous for their baking. It's up to you to stop your brother's evil plans as he has given in to a dark atifact,
Over the 40 main levels in the game you will master, driving a minecart, flying a balloon, swimming, baking, reversed gravity and more.
True Bakers will discover all the bonus rooms and beating the levels in Secret Land.
Remote Play requires PS Vita system and sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.
1 player
